description:
Nami hatches a plan to save Lily`s father, but the arrival of an ex-marine madman throws a monkey wrench into the rescue mission.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: - Saga dell`ambizione di Z - Il misterioso corpo della Neomarina
L’ambition de Z : Une armée puissante et mystérieuse
Z no Yabou Hen: Nazo no Saikyou Gundan Toujou!
Z`s Ambition! A Dark and Powerful Army!
Zの野望編 謎の最強軍団登場!
Амбиции Z! Появление таинственного Армейского Корпуса!
